alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Northwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 11 at 11:14AM PDT until October 12 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Northwestern Mendocino Interior and Northern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Northwestern Mendocino Interior
